sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet outil est très pratique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This tool is very practical.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet événement est sponsorisé par l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This event is sponsored by the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè hěn dà de tiǎozhàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un grand défi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a big challenge.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'était donc toi !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: So it was you!

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他写了一篇很好的文章。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiě le yī piān hěn hǎo de wénzhāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a écrit un très bon article.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He wrote a very good article.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci de m'avoir prévenu à temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for notifying me in time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè cì lǚxíng shōuhuò hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce voyage a été très enrichissant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This trip was very rewarding.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī zuò xiàndài jiànzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un bâtiment moderne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a modern building.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La banque est en face du supermarché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The bank is opposite the supermarket.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette fleur sent vraiment bon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This flower smells really nice.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a grandi à la campagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He grew up in the countryside.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Examen national unifié.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: National unified examination.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng hé nǐ dāndú tántán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais te parler en privé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like to talk to you alone.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我有一个好消息告诉你。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yī gè hǎo xiāoxi gàosu nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai une bonne nouvelle à t'annoncer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have some good news to tell you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ hěn tóngqíng tā de zāoyù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je compatis à ce qui lui est arrivé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I sympathize with what happened to him.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì gùyì zhème zuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il l'a fait exprès.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He did it on purpose.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Restons en contact.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please keep in touch.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te souhaite d'être heureux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I hope you will be happy.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a un caractère très ouvert.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She has a very cheerful personality.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在房地产方面投资很多。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài fángdìchǎn fāngmiàn tóuzī hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il investit beaucoup dans l'immobilier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He invests a lot in real estate.
